title: OnePlus rolls out April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 7T series, and Nord N100
content:
After rolling out the April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 9 series and OnePlus Nord 2 last week, OnePlus is now rolling out a similar update for the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 7T series, and the Nord N100. The latest update for these devices has started rolling out to users in various regions, and

The post OnePlus rolls out April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 7T series, and Nord N100 appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus has started rolling out the April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7, OnePlus 7 Pro, OnePlus 7T, OnePlus 7T Pro, and the Nord N100.
